tips.title: Deep Breathing
tips.description: Take a slow, deep breath in through your nose for 4 seconds, hold for 4 seconds, then exhale through your mouth for 4 seconds. Repeat 5 times.

tips.title: 4-7-8 Breathing
tips.description: Inhale quietly through your nose for 4 seconds, hold your breath for 7 seconds, exhale completely through your mouth for 8 seconds. Repeat 4 times.

tips.title: Take Breaks
tips.description: Every hour, stand up, stretch, and take a 5-minute walk. This helps reset your mind and reduce physical tension.

tips.title: Digital Detox
tips.description: Set aside 30 minutes before bed with no screens. Read a book or meditate to help you unwind and sleep better.

tips.title: Set Boundaries
tips.description: Define clear work hours and stick to them. Turn off work notifications outside of these hours to maintain balance.

tips.title: Hobbies & Interests
tips.description: Dedicate time each week to activities you enjoy that are unrelated to work. This helps maintain mental well-being.

tips.title: You're Doing Great
tips.description: Remember that it's okay to not be perfect. Progress takes time, and every small step counts towards your goals.

tips.title: Self-Compassion
tips.description: Be kind to yourself. Treat yourself with the same understanding and patience you would offer a good friend.
